meta.description: Determine the number of trucks to send to warehouses A and B to minimize freight cost while meeting material requirements.

sets.name: WAREHOUSES
sets.description: Warehouses from which materials are transported

sets.name: MATERIALS
sets.description: Types of materials required for production

params.name: transport_capacity
params.description: Transport capacity of each truck from each warehouse for each material

params.name: freight_cost
params.description: Freight cost per truck from each warehouse

vars.name: trucks
vars.description: Number of trucks to send from each warehouse

objective.name: min_total_freight_cost
objective.expr: sum(freight_cost[w] * trucks[w] for w in WAREHOUSES)
objective.description: Minimize the total freight cost of sending trucks from warehouses

constraints.name: material_A_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure at least the required amount of material A is transported

constraints.name: material_B_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure at least the required amount of material B is transported

constraints.name: material_C_requirement
constraints.description: Ensure at least the required amount of material C is transported
